text.content: I may be misinterpreting the distinction between the two text+url link types, but this doesnâ€™t really matter. What matters is that Notion has demonstrated in their own UI that these two link styles can be treated differently â€” even if the only difference is a slight shift in font-weight â€”Â and so thereâ€™s no reason we canâ€™t consider a similar option.
